name: Day in the Life of a Harpy 2
name_original: Day in the Life of a Harpy 2
description:
A sequel to the first Day in the Life of a Harpy,  this game on its own will aim to make the Day in the Life of a Harpy's original formula much more interesting than before, adding new gameplay elements,  better graphics, and overall aiming to be a much more enjoyable and unique experience.

            Duri finds herself rather annoyed by the strong winds that have been plaguing her town as of late, and decides to take these matters into her own hands to stop whatever is causing this phenomenon!

Collect 1629 Hearts in six different levels! 

Also try to find the secret shortcut in the first level!
